author: pbs.org
title: Indian Summers: Stories from the Set | Watch Masterpiece
text: Actors Henry Lloyd-Hughes, Nikesh Patel, and series creator Paul Rutman tell their shocking stories from the subtropic set. Indian Summers airs Sundays, September 27 - November 22, 2015 at 9/8c on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #IndianSummersPBS
